name: Lust Academy: Season 1
storyline:
You play as an 18 years old guy who has missed an opportunity to go to college with a sports scholarship due to injury.
However, a new, unbelievable opportunity knocks on your door the day you receive the letter from Cordale Academy of Magic and Wizardry.

Visit the oldest magic academy in New World, meet charming girls, true friends, and formidable enemies! Explore the magical world, solve mysteries and get from novice to an Almighty legendary wizard!

All of this, and more in Lust Academy.
summary: Lust Academy is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel about adventures and studying in the school of magic and wizardry. Play as a young guy who got invited to Cordale Academy. The whole world full of sorcery and passion awaits you!
